name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Dark Knight
name_original: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Dark Knight
description:
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Dark Knight is an arcade game. It was originally released in 2014. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: The Dark Knight on PC.
